bibl.title: Letter from Philip Showalter Hench to George and Nadine Hench, January 26, 1942

div1.p: Philip Hench thanks George and Nadine Hench for their hospitality in Washington.

div1.head: Letter from Philip Showalter Hench to George and Nadine Hench, January 26, 1942
div1.p:
We had such a nice time seeing you in Washington
and we had a most pleasant Sunday with you. We were de-
lighted that you could come to our little Willard party
and hope that we will see you again in Washington when we
visit there.
div1.closer:
Sincerely, P.S. Hench, M. D. Mr. and Mrs. George Hench
2480 Sixteenth Street N. W.
Dorchester House
Washington, D. C.
